spatial_accuracy.notes: Major structural failure: the 3D render projects a duplicate building structure behind the intended floor plan. Door placement is inconsistent with the layout, and wall thicknesses vary wildly between the foreground 2D-overlay and the 3D-extruded background rooms.

structural_fidelity.notes: Severe hallucination of a secondary floor level/extension behind the main unit. This structure contains a bathroom and rooms not present in the reference plan. The model is partially floating but suffers from conflicting perspective logic.

furniture_mapping.notes: Foreground elements follow the 2D sketches well, but elements in the hallucinated 'back' section do not exist in the source material.

aesthetic_quality.notes: While it captures the low-poly aesthetic and dark background, it fails on isometric orthographic correctness due to perspective warping and includes dramatic glow-lighting in windows which deviates from the flat-shading requirement.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated rooms and a secondary apartment structure extending beyond the original floor plan boundaries.
Misplaced structural walls and incorrect perspective alignment between the floor plan base and the 3D walls.
Dramatic lighting and glowing interiors violate the flat shading/no dramatic lighting constraint.
Perspective camera used instead of a true isometric orthographic camera, leading to vanishing point distortion.
